title: The Writer's Almanac - Friday, November 13, 2020
description: It's the birthday of St. Augustine, born in Tagaste, Numidia (354), a part of North Africa that is now Algeria.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of St. Augustine, born in Tagaste, Numidia (354), a part of North Africa that is now Algeria.
